name: Indian Spiced Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs ghee (or non-flavoured oil of your choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut potatoes into chunks and boil in water until cooked through. Drain the potatoes and set aside.

Heat up some ghee or oil in a pan, then add the garlic, black and yellow mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry powder, red chilli powder (optional) and curry leaves. Toss until fragrant. Be careful not to burn the spices. Add a splash of water if the spices become too dry.
Add tomato puree and a splash of water to loosen the sauce if required.
Add the potatoes to the pan, stir the sauce to coat the potatoes and warm through.
Transfer to a bowl or plate. Squeeze some lemon juice over the top and garnish with coriander if desired.
